Partly cloudy skies PERIOD Low 44F PERIOD Winds light and variable PERIOD

Updated November     pm



With season ticket sales for the  ECU basketball campaign already underway singlegame ticket sales for ECU mens and womens home games during the upcoming season will begin being sold this morning PERIOD

Singlegame tickets may be purchased at ECU OnLine Ticket Center or by calling the ECU Athletics Ticket Office 1800DIALECU PERIOD

Tickets for Fridays mens basketball exhibition versus Montreat inside Williams Arena at Minges Coliseum are  for adults and  for kids  and under PERIOD Ticket prices for regularseason mens basketball games against Erskine LenoirRhyne and Fayetteville State are also available for the same price PERIOD

Individual ticket prices for all mens Conference USA games as well as games against Campbell UNCGreensboro Charlotte and Old Dominion are  for adults and  for kids  and under PERIOD

Two miniseason ticket packages are also available PERIOD The Purple Package allows fans to choose any eight home games for  while the Gold Package allows fans to choose any five games for  PERIOD

Womens basketball singlegame tickets are also available PERIOD Tickets for all womens basketball games are  for adults and free for youth ages  and under PERIOD Groups of  or more are  each PERIOD

The ECU women will play their only preseason exhibition game Saturday Nov PERIOD  at  p.m PERIOD versus NCAA Division II Mount Olive at Minges Coliseum following the football game against Navy PERIOD Admission to the exhibition game is free PERIOD
